changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), FFFS_LOC_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, FFFS_LOC_NAME NVARCHAR(64), COASTAL_ORDER INT NOT NULL, CENTRE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, MFDO_AREA NVARCHAR(64), TA_NAME NVARCHAR(MAX), COASTAL_TYPE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED([ID]), CONSTRAINT CHK_TIDAL_COASTAL_FORECASTING_TYPE CHECK (COASTAL_TYPE = 'Coastal Forecasting' OR ( COASTAL_TYPE = 'Triton' AND ( TA_NAME IS NOT NULL AND MFDO_AREA IS NOT NULL ) ) OR ( COASTAL_TYPE = 'Multivariate Thresholds' AND ( TA_NAME IS NOT NULL AND MFDO_AREA IS NOT NULL ) ) ) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_FORECAST_LOCATION
